name: Pop Match - Crush 3 Ice Cubes
description:
Pop Match Puzzle is a super addictive match puzzle game that will engage your brains and skills to the max!

The games comes with different difficulties and challenges as you progress trough the levels. The goals of the game also changes as you go along. It comes with very simple game controls to let you stay focused to reach the goals of individual levels. All you have to do is swipe on the screen to connect various shapes.

It sure looks easy but it is very challenging but addicting and fun at the same time. So just download it today for free and have a blast with it. Enjoy!
